biotools.summary: An algorithm that discovers one or more motifs in a collection of DNA or protein sequences by using the technique of expectation maximization to fit a two-component finite mixture model to the set of sequences.

bioschemas.name: meme_meme
bioschemas.summary: An algorithm that discovers one or more motifs in a collection of DNA or protein sequences by using the technique of expectation maximization to fit a two-component finite mixture model to the set of sequences.

galaxy.summary: The MEME Suite allows the biologist to discover novel motifs in collections of unaligned nucleotideor protein sequences, and to perform a wide variety of other motif-based analyses.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: An algorithm that discovers one or more motifs in a collection of DNA or protein sequences by using the technique of expectation maximization to fit a two-component finite mixture model to the set of sequences.
